name: Adidas Men's Lite Racer Adapt 5.0 Running Shoe

about.one: Men's running-inspired shoes for lightweight comfort
about.two: CUSHIONED MIDSOLE: Cloudfoam midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning
about.three: FLEXIBLE UPPER: Soft textile upper is stretchy and comfortable
about.four: SYNTHETIC OUTSOLE: A durable synthetic outsole provides traction
about.five: MADE WITH RECYCLED CONTENT: Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste

about.one: REVAMPED DESIGN: One4all, all for one: every detail on these shoes conspires to make your run a little bit more fun. From Softride and SoftFoam+ technology to cushion your feet to the special lacing system, it's all geared towards comfort on the go.
about.two: ENHANCED TECHNOLOGY: Utilizes PUMA's SoftFoam+, a step-in comfort sockliner designed to provide soft cushioning thanks to its extra thick heel.
about.three: PERFORMANCE-DRIVEN: Utilizes PUMA's Softride EVA tech, our softest foam providing extreme cushioning and all-day comfort.
about.four: ENHANCED VENTILATION: Features a breathable, mesh upper.
about.five: FOREVER BETTER: PUMA is always pushing to be better than we were yesterday. FOREVER BETTER is our commitment to reduce our environmental impact and work together towards a sustainable future. The shoe's upper is made with recycled material

about.one: Men's Sneakers with Signature Style: Featuring a comfortable and supportive synthetic upper with a classic leather look, all these men's fashion sneakers are missing is your fierce game face
about.two: Durable and Efficient Tennis Shoes for Men: These stylish sneakers for men feature a lightweight yet supportive die-cut EVA midsole designed to withstand many strolls and jogs
about.three: Walking Shoes with Comfort and Style: These men's tennis shoes feature a low-top design that offers enhanced ankle mobility, so you can keep moving all day long; A padded foam sockliner adds extra cushion
about.four: Traction in Mind: These shoes feature highly abrasion-resistant rubber outsoles for durable responsiveness, so you can move with confidence
about.five: High Performance: Ideal for walking and jogging as well as casual daily wear, these shoes always look and feel great regardless of where life takes you

about.one: Men's running shoes for getting your daily miles

about.one: Versatile Workout Shoes: Our combination training shoes & running shoes take your workout to the next level with a Lift and Run Chassis system; A dome-shaped heel piece compresses under load for a stable platform then softens when you push off to run
about.two: Soft and Durable Upper: These sneakers for men and women feature a Flexweave knit upper that's breathable yet durable enough for tough training sessions, with integrated support for stable multidirectional movement
about.three: Responsive and Flexible Men's and Women's Athletic Shoes: Floatride Energy Foam provides lightweight, responsive cushioning while maintaining the stability of these men's and women's training shoes, making running the easiest part of working out
about.four: Reliable Traction: Featuring a durable rubber outsole, these athletic shoes for everyone allow you to train anywhere in any weather
about.five: Stylish, Supportive Build: The ultra-stylish design and supportive structure of these lightweight workout shoes help you crush your workout goals and feel good about what you're wearing too

about.one: ENHANCED TECHNOLOGY: Utilizes PUMA's SoftFoam+, a step-in comfort sockliner designed to provide soft cushioning thanks to its extra thick heel.
about.two: EYE-CATCHING: Iconic PUMA Formstrip on the lateral sides and PUMA branding on the heel.
about.three: COMFORT AND SUPPORT: Constructed utilizing a brand new visual and foam for optimal comfort.

about.one: Unleash the Athlete Within: Workout the way you want - these versatile men's and women's athletic sneakers enable you to jump, climb, and workout with complete confidence
about.two: Superior Comfort & Support: Designed to help you optimize your workouts, these comfortable gym shoes for men and women provide the lightweight, responsive cushioning of running shoes, while maintaining the performance and stability of training shoes
about.three: Signature Style: With the sleek shape and ultra-stylish design of these workout shoes for men and women, you'll crush your workout goals and look good doing it
about.four: Next-Level Performance: Our men's and women's athletic shoes are designed to help you conquer your fitness goals; Slip on a pair of our training sneakers for men and women and enjoy enhanced agility, speed, and endurance
about.five: Move with Confidence: The perfect crossfit shoes for men and women, these training shoes are designed to handle cross-training sessions and intense workouts, from cardio and lifting to climbing and running

about.one: HEAT-, OIL- & SLIP-RESISTANT OUTSOLE: The 572°F heat-resistant HRO rubber outsole is inspired by the latest running shoe technology.
about.two: COMPOSITE TOE CAP: The fiberglass reinforced composite toe cap offers more space for the toes, is lighter than a common steel cap, antimagnetic and thermally insulating.
about.three: HIGH ENERGY RETURN: The intelligent midsole made of IMPULSE.FOAM reacts to every step with an energy impulse.
about.four: SUPPORT & STABILITY: The TPU torsion control element in the middle of the sole supports the natural flexing action of the foot while walking and provides a better support and stability for the feet.
about.five: ADDITIONAL FEATURES: Static dissipative, metal free, abrasion resistant toe overlay, heel support, quick lacing system.
